attributes.action: Declare St George's Day an English National Holiday
attributes.additional_details: I strongly believe that St George's Day (23rd April), should be declared an English National Holiday so that every Englishman/woman can celebrate their Patron Saint. England is the only country within the UK that does not have an official Holiday to recognise its Patron Saint.

rejection.details:
Sorry, this isn't very clear when you say a National Holiday.  Are you wanting to make it a Bank Holiday (people off work?), or want the Government to organise a day of celebration?

If you want to create a new Bank Holiday, please re-submit for the attention of the Department for Business.

(the other countries actually don't have 'official holidays' for their Patron Saints - people still go to work on those days, banks remain open etc.)
